summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley between blocks 7 and 8, Front Street Cable Addition, being the alley between Queen Anne Avenue and 1st Avenue North, from Ray Street to Smith Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 96486 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
